transcription: Hello, my name is Changlin Do. I'm in charge of New Year's biology development programs.  I decided to come to work every day because I'm really proud of what my team is doing in bringing innovative medicine to the Chinese market.  I am Kenneth from Singapore. I am in charge of the Liye Group overseas finance. Your arrival will help Liye to be more international and diversified. I sincerely hope that you will have a good time in Singapore.  a better future with VIA. Here at the US office, our responsibility is to conduct clinical research with our in-house product. So far we have completed more than 10 clinical trials with six projects. The most advanced one is at NDA Stage. We are so excited to have our German friends join our big family. Hi, I'm Julia Strickland-Bellamy.  and I'm Executive General Manager for Queensland and Western Australia for Healthy Care Australia. Earlier this year, Healthy Care officially became part of the Luye Medical Group. To all the new members of the Luye Group, a big welcome from Australia, Ravita Private Hospital on the Gold Coast. My name's Courtney and I'm from the sunny Central Coast, just an hour away from Sydney, and I work for Gosser Private Hospital. Welcome to the Luye Group.  We work in Shanghai office, including international strategy, overseas merger and investor relations management. This time we welcome new colleagues from Germany to join the Green Leaf family. My name is Wang Hongsheng, from the Green Leaf Changqing Academy. I like Germany and German beer very much. I hope we can drink local beer in Mieswache to discuss how Green Leaf goes to the world.
